Note: to honor KEEP_IN_MIND2 which limits datafields to <=2, we adjust implementation to use sequential operations on aggregate; instead implement as subtract(subtract(call_breakeven_10, put_breakeven_10), subtract(call_breakeven_60, put_breakeven_60)). Therefore we instead use two aggregated proxies: (call_breakeven_10 - put_breakeven_10) approximated by subtract(call_breakeven_10, put_breakeven_10) and compare to (call_breakeven_60 - put_breakeven_60) by a second operator — but that exceeds 2 datafields.
